data.prayer: Jesus, you are the great high priest, please make the 48,965 believers in Demerara-Mahaica, Guyana a worthy priesthood under you.
data.verse: Since then we have a great high priest who has passed through the heavens, Jesus, the Son of God, let us hold fast our confession.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Demerara-Mahaica, Guyana
data.section_summary: What conditions of religion or environment could you pray for here?

data.prayer: Jesus, help the local leaders in Demerara-Mahaica, Guyana not be proud but humble, and willing to wash the feet of all they serve.
data.verse: “You call me ‘Teacher’ and ‘Lord,’ and rightly so, for that is what I am. Now that I, your Lord and Teacher, have washed your feet, you also should wash one another’s feet. I have set you an example that you should do as I have done for you.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 6 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Spirit, give the believers of the the state of Demerara-Mahaica unity and humility as they work to bring the kingdom to new people and places.
Father, please send new teachers into the harvest, who can correct the lies of our enemy in the state of Demerara-Mahaica, Guyana.
data.verse: Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.prayer: Father, I pray against the principalities, against the powers, against the world’s rulers of darkness of this age, and against the spiritual forces of the wickedness in the heavenly places that are warring against the Urdu people.
Spirit, help the church in the state of Demerara-Mahaica do things that will multiply their numbers, not just add to them.
data.verse: But thanks be to God, who always leads us triumphantly as captives in Christ and through us spreads everywhere the fragrance of the knowledge of Him.

data.prayer: Father, please raise up prophets in Demerara-Mahaica who can call the church to holiness and purity, preparing your church as a bride for your Son.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Father, please give the people in the state of Demerara-Mahaica access to a Bible in their own language.

location.name: Demerara-Mahaica
location.people_groups_list: Macushi, Pemon, Taulipang, Han Chinese, Hakka, Han Chinese, Cantonese, Sarnami Hindi
